name: Italian Feasts
description: Special feast selections curated by Sound of Love Luca

feasts.name: Italian Porchetta
feasts.description: Italian Porchetta served Crispy Pinsa Romana, Iceberg Salad, Beer, and Chimichurri Sauce

feasts.name: Umbria Feast
feasts.description: A celebration of Umbria and Tuscany culinary traditions (Gnocco Fritto, Bruschette, Cold Cuts Selection Pizzette, Pinsa Romana). Ideal to exeprience the Italian Happy Hour Vide

feasts.name: Family Style Feast
feasts.description: Large sharing platters of Luca's most beloved recipes (Different type of Lasagna), perfect for family-style dining. Ideal for family and friends gathering
